text: Jonathan Michael Batiste (born November 11, 1986) is an American singer, musician, educator, and bandleader. Batiste is known for being the music director and bandleader for The Late Show with Stephen Colbert. He has won an Academy Award, BAFTA Award, Golden Globe Award and Grammy Award for co- composing the score of Disney Pixar Soul (2020). In 2022, he won five Grammy Awards for his album We Are. Batiste is married to journalist and author Suleika Jaouad since 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * *"Jon Batiste: Staying Human", interview by Bob Kenselaar, All About Jazz, January 2013, re- published June 7, 2015 Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American musicians Category:20th-century American singers Category:21st-century American musicians Category:Educators from Louisiana Category:Singers from Louisiana Category:Musicians from Louisiana Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:Academy Award winning composers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning composers Category:American jazz musicians Category:American jazz singers Category:American pop singers Category:American pop musicians Category:Comedians from Louisiana Category:American pianists Category:American rock musicians Category:American rock singers Category:American R&B; singers Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American funk singers Category:American funk musicians Category:American television personalities Category:American bandleaders
title: Jon Batiste
